definitions.definition: A man , generally a younger man.
examples: So we were at the mall and these two dudes just walk up to us and say "hi".

definitions.definition: A term of address for someone, typically a man , particularly when cautioning them or offering advice .
examples: Dude , I'd be careful around the principal; he's having a bad day.
Watch it, dude ; you almost knocked me over.

definitions.definition: A man who is very concerned about his dress and appearance ; a dandy , a fop .

main_definition: ( chiefly US , Canada , colloquial ) A man , generally a younger man.
secondary_definitions: ( colloquial , used in the vocative ) A term of address for someone, typically a man , particularly when cautioning them or offering advice .
( archaic ) A man who is very concerned about his dress and appearance ; a dandy , a fop .
